additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: CARBONATED WATER (MINERAL WATER (83%), PURIFIED WATER), RECONSTITUTED JUICE (LEMON (4.5%), LIME (0.5%)), NATURAL FLAVOURS, PRESERVATIVE (211), SWEETENERS (952, 955, 950), NATURAL COLOUR (163), FOOD ACID (CITRIC).

description: Waterfords Lite & Fruity is the lighter, fruitier way of enjoying Sparkling Flavoured Mineral Water. Made from lightly carbonated natural mineral water and 5% fruit juice, Waterfords Lite & Fruity also contains no added sugar, in fact there is less than 30kJ per serve!
name: Lemon Lime Bitters Lite & Fruity Sparkling Mineral Water
